original_text: For every one of the house of Israel, or of the stranger that sojourneth in Israel, which separateth himself from me, and setteth up his idols in his heart, and putteth the stumblingblock of his iniquity before his face, and cometh to a prophet to enquire of him concerning me; I the Lord will answer him by myself:
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속과 이스라엘 가운데에 거류하는 외국인 중에 누구든지 나를 떠나고 자기 우상을 마음에 들이며 죄악의 걸림돌을 자기 앞에 두고 자기를 위하여 내게 묻고자 하여 선지자에게 가는 모든 자에게는 나 여호와가 친히 응답하여

sentences.original_text: For every one of the house of Israel
or of the stranger that sojourneth in Israel
and setteth up his idols in his heart
and putteth stumblingblock of his iniquity before his face
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 앞에 그의 불의에 걸림돌을 놓고

sentences.original_text: to enquire of him concerning me
I the Lord will answer him by myself
